events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size I ordered does not fit me at all.
The customer reported a refund request due to an issue with the product size not fitting properly.
Assigning the case to refund specialist agent for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request regarding the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is #458972. The jacket is brand new and I have not used or damaged it at all.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back to the address we will provide shortly.
Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and will send the jacket back as instructed.
We have processed your refund request once we receive the returned jacket. You will be notified via email when the refund is complete.
Just following up to confirm that we received your returned jacket and your refund has been issued successfully.
Thank you for your cooperation. Your refund case is now closed. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
We would appreciate if you could complete a short satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
